div.p: Interpretation of a test result as positive, negative, equivocal, or indeterminate. Consolidates LOINC answer lists LL360-9, LL2329-2, LL2038-9, LL2021-5, LL2010-8, LL2009-0.

publisher.value: HL7 Patient Care WG and Community-Based Care and Privacy WG

description.value: Interpretation of a test result as positive, negative, equivocal, or indeterminate. Consolidates LOINC answer lists LL360-9, LL2329-2, LL2038-9, LL2021-5, LL2010-8, LL2009-0.

display.value: Equivocal. Equivocal represents a borderline value, too close to call; for example, a value very close to a cut-off between positive and negative
Indeterminate. Indeterminate means the results were uninterpretable, or cannot be determined; technical issues prevented obtaining a valid result.
